Placemark.name: 395 Dogwood Ln
Placemark.description: If what you're looking for is a conveniently located hotel in New York (NY), look no further than Empire Hotel. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. No less exceptional is the hotel's easy access to the city's myriad attractions and landmarks, such as David Rubenstein Atrium, New York State Theater, West Side YMCA.

Placemark.name: Beach Back with pool
Placemark.description: Offering hotel guests superior services and a broad range of amenities, Intercontinental New York Times Square Hotel is committed to ensuring that your stay is as comfortable as possible. To name a few of the hotel's facilities, there are facilities for disabled guests, ATM/cash machine on site, bar, elevator, dry cleaning.

Placemark.name: Harbor Islands Intracoastal Waterway
Placemark.description: Nestled in the heart of Times Square, Intercontinental New York Times Square Hotel is an ideal spot from which to discover New York (NY). From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With the city's main attractions such as Majestic Theater, AMC Empire 25, Madame Tussaud's New York Inc within close reach, visitors to the hotel will just love its location.

Placemark.name: Penthouse Sky Dream
Placemark.description: Situated in Central Park - Upper West Side, Riverside Terrace New York is the perfect place to experience New York (NY) and its surroundings. Situated only 4 km from the city center, guests are well located to enjoy the town's attractions and activities. For sightseeing options and local attractions, one need not look far as the hotel enjoys close proximity to Children's Museum of Manhattan, Leat, Hayden Planetarium.
